Articles.Content:
Hey guys. I'm new to mods in KSP and especially HyperEdit. I just downloaded it, and I kinda broke my entire game and I don't know how to fix it. I made it so kerbin is pretty much inside of the sun, and now whenever I spawn anything it just enters space because it is where kerbin should be, but its not there. I don't know how to fix it though, so if anyone could help, that would be great!

 

Edit:

I'm dumb, just figured it out. Never mind!

Edited September 25, 2018 by DatBass
